## Coerce Vectors to Appropriate Data Types

The following features will be coerced:

* **chart_date** from string to date
* **artist** from string to factor

```{r}
billboard$chart_date <- as.Date(billboard$chart_date)
summary(billboard$chart_date)
```


```{r}
billboard$artist <- as.factor(billboard$artist)
levels(billboard$artist)
```

```{r}
str(billboard)
```
